thread.title: Stephanie Davis shares adorable snap of son Caben-Albi ahead of ex Jeremy McConnell's appearance on This Morning
thread.title_full: Stephanie Davis shares adorable snap of son Caben-Albi ahead of ex Jeremy McConnell's appearance on This Morning

author: Vicki Newman
title: Stephanie Davis shares adorable snap of son Caben-Albi ahead of ex Jeremy McConnell's appearance on This Morning
text:
Her fans couldn't handle the cuteness. 
One wrote: "He is such a beautiful baby god bless him". 
And another said: "He looks just like you gorgeous x" 
Jeremy is apparently going to spill the beans on their relationship when he appears on the ITV show. 
Steph, 23, met Jeremy, 26, last year when they were taking part in Celebrity Big Brother together. Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell (Photo: Stephanie Davis / Twitter) 
They fell in love and continued dating on the outside world until things turned sour. 
Steph found out she was pregnant after they broke up, and at first, Jeremy said she was lying. 
When it became clear she wasn't, he denied he is the father, saying that she was seeing other men at the same time as him. 
He previously told Mirror Celeb that he wants a paternity test and still plans to go forward with it. Read More It's all over (Photo: Rex/Shutterstock) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
